message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth more than $8,000. Considering its true worth, I propose a starting price of $10,000 for this exceptional item.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. While I recognize the value of the product, your starting price is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $8,500 for it.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product and your willingness to pay, I propose we settle on $9,500 for the transaction.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I'm glad we're finding common ground here, Bob. In light of your proposal, I suggest we aim for $9,300 as the final price for the product. This reflects its value while accommodating your budget.
Alice, this negotiation is dragging on a bit.  I'm willing to offer $9,100 to close this out quickly.

Considering the ongoing discussion and aiming for a mutually beneficial agreement, I propose a final price of $9,200 for the product. This respects both the value of the item and your willingness to pay.
